devdoc.author: Julien Niset - <julien@argent.xyz>
devdoc.details: The WalletFactory contract creates and assigns wallets to accounts.

changeENSManager(address).details: Lets the owner change the address of the ENS manager contract.

params._ensManager: The address of the ENS manager contract.

changeGuardianStorage(address).details: Lets the owner change the address of the GuardianStorage contract.

params._guardianStorage: The address of the GuardianStorage contract.

changeModuleRegistry(address).details: Lets the owner change the address of the module registry contract.

params._moduleRegistry: The address of the module registry contract.

changeOwner(address).details: Lets the owner transfer ownership of the contract to a new owner.

createCounterfactualWallet(address,addre.details: Lets the manager create a wallet for an owner account at a specific address. The wallet is initialised with a list of modules and an ENS. The wallet is created using the CREATE2 opcode.

params._label: ENS label of the new wallet, e.g. franck.

createCounterfactualWalletWithGuardian(a.details: Lets the manager create a wallet for an owner account at a specific address. The wallet is initialised with a list of modules, a first guardian, and an ENS. The wallet is created using the CREATE2 opcode.

params._label: ENS label of the new wallet, e.g. franck.

createWallet(address,address[],string).details: Lets the manager create a wallet for an owner account. The wallet is initialised with a list of modules and an ENS.. The wallet is created using the CREATE opcode.

params._label: ENS label of the new wallet, e.g. franck.

createWalletWithGuardian(address,address.details: Lets the manager create a wallet for an owner account. The wallet is initialised with a list of modules, a first guardian, and an ENS.. The wallet is created using the CREATE opcode.

params._label: ENS label of the new wallet, e.g. franck.

getAddressForCounterfactualWallet(addres.details: Gets the address of a counterfactual wallet.
getAddressForCounterfactualWallet(addres.return: the address that the wallet will have when created using CREATE2 and the same input parameters.

getAddressForCounterfactualWalletWithGua.details: Gets the address of a counterfactual wallet with a first default guardian.
getAddressForCounterfactualWalletWithGua.return: the address that the wallet will have when created using CREATE2 and the same input parameters.

init(address).details: Inits the module for a wallet by logging an event. The method can only be called by the wallet itself.

devdoc.title: WalletFactory
